item.title: Actor-Critic vs. Value-Based: Empirical Trade-offs
item.description: An empirical comparison of Value-Based and Actor-Critic reinforcement learning algorithms across discrete and continuous action spaces, analyzing trade-offs in convergence speed, stability, and performance.
